arm_group.description:
3 parts:
- Single Dose, Diltiazem (Day 1)
- Multiple Dose, Clarithromycin XL (Days 4-9)
- Single Dose, Diltiazem (Day 8)

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the drug-drug interaction potential of
      clarithromycin XL on Diltiazem hydrochloride (DTZ) 2% cream.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Interaction Potential of Clarithromycin XL on Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream 2% in Healthy Subjects

group.description:
3 parts:
- Diltiazem Single Dose
- Clarithromycin XL (Days 4-9)
- Diltiazem Single Dose after Clarithromycin
Clarithromycin XL: Clarithromycin XL administered once daily on Days 4 through 9 as 2 x 500 mg tablets, 1000 mg per day, for a total of 6000 mg
2% Diltiazem: 2% Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream applied on Day 1 & Day 8 to the perianal area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg)
group.title: 2% Diltiazem & Clarithromycin XL

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.

outcome.description: To evaluate the drug-drug interaction potential of clarithromycin XL on Diltiazem hydrochloride (DTZ) 2% cream.

group.description: On the morning of Day 1, subjects received a single dose of DTZ 2% cream (~2.5 cm [1 inch] strip of cream containing approximately 8.5 mg DTZ) applied perianally. area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg)
group.title: Diltiazem Single Dose

group.description: 2% Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream applied on Day 8 to the perianal area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg) following Clarithromycin XL administered once daily on Days 4 through 9 as 2 x 500 mg tablets, 1000 mg per day, for a total of 6000 mg
group.title: Diltiazem Single Dose After Clarithromycin

measure.description: To evaluate the drug-drug interaction potential of clarithromycin XL on Diltiazem hydrochloride (DTZ) 2% cream.
measure.title: Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of 2% Diltiazem

outcome.title: Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of 2% Diltiazem

group.description:
3 parts:
- Diltiazem Single Dose
- Clarithromycin XL (Days 4-9)
- Diltiazem Single Dose after Clarithromycin
Clarithromycin XL: Clarithromycin XL administered once daily on Days 4 through 9 as 2 x 500 mg tablets, 1000 mg per day, for a total of 6000 mg
2% Diltiazem: 2% Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream applied on Day 1 & Day 8 to the perianal area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg)
group.title: 2% Diltiazem & Clarithromycin XL

group.description: On the morning of Day 1, subjects received a single dose of DTZ 2% cream (~2.5 cm [1 inch] strip of cream containing approximately 8.5 mg DTZ) applied perianally. area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg)
group.title: Diltiazem Single Dose

group.description: On Days 4 through 9, subjects received once daily doses of clarithromycin XL (2 tablets, 500 mg/tablet, total dose = 1000 mg/day; 6000 mg total in 6 days) with 24 hours between doses.
group.title: Clarithromycin XL (Days 4-9)

group.description: 2% Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream applied on Day 8 to the perianal area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg) following Clarithromycin XL administered once daily on Days 4 through 9 as 2 x 500 mg tablets, 1000 mg per day, for a total of 6000 mg
group.title: Diltiazem Single Dose After Clarithromycin

detailed_description.textblock:
This study was designed to investigate the potential effect of clarithromycin XL at steady
      state (administered orally, once daily on Days 4 through 9 as 2 x 500 mg tablets, 1000 mg
      per day, for a total of 6000 mg) on the PK of a single topical dose of diltiazem
      hydrochloride 2% cream applied to the perianal area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg).  This was a
      Phase 1 study with a single treatment arm.  Efficacy was not assessed; therefore the study
      was of open-label design.

intervention.description: Clarithromycin XL administered once daily on Days 4 through 9 as 2 x 500 mg tablets, 1000 mg per day, for a total of 6000 mg
2% Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream applied on Day 1 & Day 8 to the perianal area (~2.5 cm [1 inch]; ~8.5 mg)

clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1, Open-label, Drug-drug Interaction Study to Evaluate the Interaction Potential of Clarithromycin XL on Diltiazem Hydrochloride Cream 2% in Healthy Subjects

authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the drug-drug interaction potential of clarithromycin XL on Diltiazem hydrochloride (DTZ) 2% cream.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
